name: (Don't) pet the Cat
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of applied Sciences Europe in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "One Button".

Game Description  

(Dont') Pet the Cat is a tiny game about befriending a grumpy and testing your own patience.

You see a Cat sitting across the room...

It looks grumpy.
But also veeery cute and fluffy.
You know that it's not a good idea to pet it.
But you can't help yourself.. You just have to pet it, don't you?

Key Features

  • Meet a cute, but grumpy cat!
  • Make a new friend (or not) by only holing down your space bar!
  • Test your patience

Credits

  • Ditzie Doodle
  • Lots of Coding help from Stefan@DigitalPenguin
  • Boom Music(No Copyright Music ) - 강아지같지?
  • All Sound effects are from freesound.org
